description: rhythm game in the style of Rock Band(tm) and Guitar Hero(tm)
details:
FoFiX (Frets on Fire X) is a fork of Frets on Fire with many added
 features. The object of the game is to accurately play guitar, bass,
 or drums using the keyboard (or guitar and drum controllers from Guitar
 Hero(tm) and Rock Band(tm)) and to sing lyrics as accurately as
 possible. Many different single-player and multi-player game modes are
 available.
